documents.document:
Organize Ur desk

Ah today i had to do the wrost thing, i had to clean up my DESK!

God i hate this job, werent be some1 like he can put all my papers in my files?

What to do ?? i have to wait for 1 month, my assistant is in vocation and i am tired already of putting all the papers back to their folder which i don't know any


i hear the sound of ZzzZz??

if u r getting sleepy of reading this, i don't care, i write this for my own reference

so my boss saw my desk and he told me to clean it up in 2 hours

but hey, it's very lil for me

and the time is up and i had to go out of theoffice la??!!

before i run away, he saw me and told me to come early 2moro one hour earlier just to clean up

i don't know if this is his right or not

but i'll leave one hour earlier

The Holiday

Today i am extreeeeemlly happy!!

I FOUND IT!

Yes i did found it,

this sweeet gentle soundtrack that i have been looking for since this movie was released in bahrain!

have i mentioned the name of the movie??!

The Holiday!

one of two best movie of 2006 for me
"Click" & "The Holiday"

they tought me valuable lessons to move on in this life

and i found the soundtrack that remindes me of this movie, since i am always sayina bout myself that i am ugly fat etc..

somehow, it helped..

i am blessed by this Day as it's Friday and finding the soundtrack

again.. did i mention that this soundtrack is by Hans Zimmer?

that exmplains

Gumption

The word of the day is GUMPTION!

if u hesitate, have the GUMPTION to say it or do it

as long as you know

YOU ARE RIGHT!

Try it!

Mighty Zinger

that's it

try it!

it's soo tasty !

Others

We always feel depressed because of the things we're facing in our life...

what about others??

have you ever felt depressed because of the bad things happening to people "you just know"?

can we be once not selfish in our life?

I did yesterday, I was very sad for the un-happy event happened to my friend (friend), very far from me, yet I felt that if this happened to me, I won't be happy for the rest of day and I would be so lonely in this feeling.

For that, I have decided for this person not to feel lonely, weather she know it or not, I should share the feeling. @ least I would find out what does it feel like if this happened to me…

Hope all your problems will be solved

"we all have problems, we all feel sad about it, so there what worst could happen if we share it once in a while, and what could happen if we bare other's problem for 5 min"?

Others shouldn't be others all the time, others should have people like us

Written by ME! do not COPY

Gilling the gap

Today is the most boring day of this week!

i know it's the start of it but i know it's booooooooooring

The Boss didn't come! i though it would be YABADEBADOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

but no..

i feel boring!

i had to eat just to fill the gap

me fatso

i wrote a warning letter for myself :D

Hey no need to know the details 3aib,

fashiliiiiiiiiiiii

BUT NO!

hey! i'm sorry my blog that i didn't write for y ou yesterday

first, i was soooooooo happy that i will go to movies

i was planning for it for days!

BUT NO!

my friends had turned me down in the las tmin, and i don't have a BF ! so should i wait for my friend or the BF to go to movies with??

Na!

so i decided to go ALONE!

and i did, i went to pay for the ticket
it was 3 BD! God everything in Bahrain is becoming expensive

and i choosed the movie "Notes of a Scandle" because it won something bla bla bla

so when i checked in the movies, everybody were looking @ me cause they think that the BF will come later on (as it's usual in bahrain hehe)

but no, i was alone, i sat in the threate and i noticed that those security guys came 3 times during the movie checking if some1 is with me

but NO! iwas alone

in fact i though that i would be despressed or something

BUT NO

i was happy, you know sometimes when you go to a movie that you picked up with some1 but the movie is not as good as you though
so all the time you will be thinking
" oh! i am afraid that he/she didn't like it, they will kill me, i hope they like the movie"

it happens to you isn't?

BUT NO

not this time, it didn't happen to me cause i was ALONE!
and i wasn't depressed or anything

i watched the whole movie, it wasn't that good, they acted well but the story is repeated and it's a known story "not recommended movie"

so i went out of the movies, and still the security people were looking @ me desbelieving that i came alone and NO BF AFTER ME

in facnt, in yesterdays' experience, i learned that i shouldn't wait just because it's common that i should go with others,

i just, simply do it

You're not WRONG!

Few days ago @ work, I was discussing this issue with my co-worker, of course we were gossiping about one of our colleges… girls u know

Anyway, we were saying that his person is always wrong and stupid, and she knows nothing.

But the way she speaks is like SHE IS RIGHT! Which makes us think that we are WRONG?

On the other hand, there is this nice girl she is ALWAYS right but because of hesitation she shows, we think that she is WRONG!

So in conclusion, we come to know that, no matter if you’re right or wrong

Act as you are SURE and 100% SURE that there is NO way that you are WRONG!

And people will say that YOU ARE RIGHT!

BUT NO - part II

i went to movies alone AGAAAAAIN

this time i have choose "the last king of scotland"

so as i walked into the movies, there was only two seats are taken, and between them it was the walkway

so, i was surprice, who will take two seperate seats in a total empty movie that the total attendance was only 3 !!!! including me

but as i walked into the movie, a boy and a girl were in those seperated seats, and as soon th girl saw me SHE RUN TO THE BACK OF THE MOVIE! just to hide from me!!!

NO KIDDING! it was a side movie for me there hehehehe

and my seat was in the same line as these fellows hehe

so i decided to SIT on my chair!

then i though, you know what? lemme go infront and give those fellow a bit of privacy, since i have destroyed it



BUT NO !!

it's my seat, and if those fellow wanna do something, let them do anywhere, NOT IN PUBLIC! so i stick to my seat

then i though, well it's not enough,,, i will go and sit in the back of the movie with th girl

7ashrah ma3a al nas yeboooooooooooooooo....

so i ruled the movies that day

About the movie

The actor really deserve the oscarrs, he was a very good actor,

The movie: it's a political movie and action so it's not recommended for girls. but not girls like me, i like political and war movies

so in conclusion, if u like those kind, its a good one, but u have to wait patiently, cause the best is in the last

Bless you all..

I'm FAT but..

Ya i am fat, something that u don't know dear blog

i am crazy about being fat, i always make fun of this part in me, i dislike being a fat, however...

I'm fat

Two days ago, i went To Chillis in Seef mall,

This time NOT ALONE! but with my friend

so as we walked in, the waitress said to me " Table for two"?

I Said: "Yes"

There was another Bahraini waiter standing next to us, and he said:
" No! Table for Three"!

And he started Laughing Out LOUD!

As he was like making fun of me being FAT!

….

No comments

I didn't say anything, he really hurt my feeling,

But

I deserve it, I am fat, so I must get those comments all the time

So I walked into the restaurant, and I told my friend about what happened

My friend, she became very mad about this

And she noticed that this Bahraini waiter was rooming around and making fun, so he sounded like a naughty guy anyway

I sat sadly, disbelieving that this guy would say that to me,

But hey! I am fat

We finished our meal and we walked out of the restaurant

But before I walk out

I took the business card of the restaurant

I went home, I called the restaurant and I asked for the Manager

And I complained…

Yes I did, that the least thing I could have done for a person who makes fun of me JUST BECAUSE I LOVE FOOD

The Manager told me that he would take care of this matter etc

And he thanked me for being calm regarding this mater

But I don’t know, I feel like that I have to do something more, cause this guy was thin and everything, which made him better than me, he is better than me in terms of looks and that

As a result, it gave him the authority to make "Funny" comments about me

So what I shall do? I loose weight to avoid such comments?

No, I want to loose weight, it's the dream for every fat and ugly girl like me

That's it for today, I can't write more, or else I'll cry

Yes I have feeling, fat and ugly people cry sometimes

When they don't gather

When you like your family soooooooooo much

and you know that they don't gather a lot

or they don't, @ all

------------------

my brothers and sister are very friendly people, very funny, i like them so much, and id on't have problem with any of them

but we never in our life had a day out together

NEVER!

this month, i got the JAM3EYA

so i though? WHY NOT?

i called them up, and invite all of them to a dinner in a lovely quiet restaurant

they were very surpriced "What's wrong with u lil sis? r u tellin bad news"?

"No", i said "why we just go out? let's all talk together as brothers and sisters"

why not? and we did

we have such a lovely time, chatting, laughing, we even shared our bad experience and good one, and we all talked about our career, what's next, and what is our problems @ work, and we helped each other

Never in our life we had a gathring like that

gr8!

a refreshment in our life, sometimes spouses, kids, co-workers are too heavy

and u JUST need time with ur family

Ur childhood mates @ home

sharing memories and hopes of what will it be for next time

what we will EAT for our next gathering
